column1: '''''ang''''' is a noun meaning "iron" in [[Sindarin]]. Compare with ''[[anga]]'' in [[Quenya]].
*<small> ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
* [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] compiled by [[Didier Willis]]</small>
